articles.content:
South side's delegation to inter-Korean talks leaves
    Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The south side's delegation to the 8th inter-Korean ministerial talks led by chief delegate Jong Se Hyon, Minister of Unification, left here today.
 The delegation was seen off at the airport by north side's delegates.

articles.title: Greetings to Zambian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Zambian President
    Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a message of greetings to Zambian President Levy Patrick Mwanawasa on Monday on the occasion of the 38th anniversary of independence of the country.
 The message wished the president and the people of Zambia greater success in their work for the country's stability and prosperity, expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between Korea and Zambia would steadily develop on good terms.

articles.title: DPRK Taekwon-do players leave for Seoul
articles.content:
DPRK Taekwon-do players leave for Seoul
    Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- An exhibition team of the Korean Taekwon-do committee led by its chairman Hwang Pong Yong left Pyongyang today to perform in Seoul.
 The team was seen off at the airport by Pak Myong Chol, chairman of the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission (PCSGC), Jang Ung, president of the International  Taekwon-do Federation who is first vice-chairman of the PCSGC, Kim Yong Sok, vice-chairman of the Korean Taekwon-do committee, officials concerned, Taekwon-do instructors and players.
